original_title: Bir An Sonra Tıpkı Bir Düş Gibi
overview: İbrahim is an ordinary person who questions life and works as a graphic designer in a book publishing house. On the one hand, he writes poems. He talks to the editor to get his poems published, but things don't turn out as he expected. He crosses paths with the poet Ada Kutay, whose book is published by İbrahim's publishing house. İbrahim has to run faster on this road now.
title: A moment later just like a dream
